pr_title: [Debugger] Add expression evaluation support for langlib function invocations

timeline.message: Add lang lib method invocation evaluation support
Improve debugger test framework to support soft assertions

timeline.author: praveennadarajah

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to introduce AssertionMode? Why do we need soft assert here?
timeline.author: praveennadarajah

replies.bodyText: @praveennadarajah Yes please refer 23fdb18. Added this soft assertion mode to see all the assertion failures at once, instead of immediately failing on a single assertion error. (This mode is useful specially when fixing test failures). Anyway the tests are running in hard assertion mode by default.
